CustomField.description: Specifies type for record. It can be either Select Field(field which need to be selected in the query) or Expression(means fields or records which will be used as a part of Where Clause/Start With/Connect By)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies type for record. It can be either Select Field(field which need to be selected in the query) or Expression(means fields or records which will be used as a part of Where Clause/Start With/Connect By)
CustomField.label: Filter Type
